content: the forever bloom square is a beautiful floral overlay crochet square designed in collaboration with scheepjes and their beautiful new terrazzo yarn earlier this summer they invited me to make a square design to celebrate granny square day 2022 which is my favourite crochet day of the year of course my answer was yes and here is the result inspired by the ever changing seasons of the archipelago i ve created three beautiful colorways autumn allure brings warm rustic notes that makes the perfect palette for autumn and christmas projects then we have the cooler winter in bloom with soft muted lilac and pink tones followed by our third one spring buds for this one i draw inspiration from the magically blue and purple anemones that pops up from the newly awaken soil after their winter slumber all three absolutely beautiful in bloom this highly textured and sweet square design makes a perfect base for such projects as pillows crossbody bags blankets and wallhangings we wish you lots of fun and happy granny squares day xxx tess
